All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ClientWalletApplication
Main entry point for the Client Wallet application.
Currency
Currency is an enumeration representing the different types of currencies supported in the wallet system.
CurrencyValidator
Validator class for ensuring that a Currency value is valid.
GlobalExceptionHandler
GlobalExceptionHandler is a Spring RestControllerAdvice that handles exceptions globally for all controllers in the application.
Transaction
Transaction represents a financial transaction between two wallets in the system.
TransactionRepository
TransactionRepository is a Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing Transaction entities.
TransactionStatus
TransactionStatus represents the different possible statuses of a transaction.
TransactionType
TransactionType represents the different types of transactions that can be performed in the system.
ValidCurrency
Custom annotation used to validate Currency values.
ValidWalletId
Custom annotation used to validate UUID wallet IDs.
Wallet
Wallet represents a user's wallet that stores funds and keeps track of transactions.
WalletController
WalletController is a REST controller that provides API endpoints for wallet-related operations.
WalletCreateRequest
WalletCreateRequest is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) used to represent the request body for creating a new wallet.
WalletCreateWalletWithNameAlreadyExistsException
Exception thrown when attempting to create a wallet with a name that already exists.
WalletDepositCurrencyMissMatchException
Exception thrown when there is a currency mismatch during a wallet deposit operation.
WalletDepositFailedException
Exception thrown when a deposit operation to a wallet fails.
WalletDepositRequest
WalletDepositRequest is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) used to represent the request body for depositing money into a wallet.
WalletIdValidator
Validator class for validating wallet IDs.
WalletNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a wallet with a specified ID is not found.
WalletRepository
WalletRepository is a Spring Data JPA repository interface for managing Wallet entities.
WalletService
WalletService is a service class that provides various wallet-related operations.
WalletTransferCurrencyMissMatchException
Exception thrown when there is a currency mismatch during a wallet transfer operation.
WalletTransferFailedException
Exception thrown when a wallet transfer operation fails.
WalletTransferNotEnoughFundsException
Exception thrown when a wallet transfer fails due to insufficient funds in the sender's wallet.
WalletTransferRequest
WalletTransferRequest is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) that represents the request body for transferring funds between two wallets.
WalletTransferSameWalletException
Exception thrown when a transfer attempt is made where the sender and receiver wallets are the same.
WalletWithdrawCurrencyMissMatchException
Exception thrown when a withdrawal attempt is made with a currency mismatch between the requested and wallet currency.
WalletWithdrawFailedException
Exception thrown when a withdrawal attempt fails from a wallet.
WalletWithdrawNotEnoughFundsException
Exception thrown when an attempt to withdraw an amount from a wallet exceeds the available funds.
WalletWithdrawRequest
WalletWithdrawRequest is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) that represents the request body for withdrawing money from a wallet.
